nodes.text: Imperial HoloNews was a news channel during the Age of the Empire. It was owned by the Galactic Empire and had a local edition for the planet Gorse. During the Gorse conflict, it reported on Count Denetrius Vidian's tour of the Gorse system and covered up his plot to detonate the moon Cynda. It published several headlines.

Imperial HoloNews first appeared in John Jackson Miller's 2014 novel A New Dawn, the first in a series of new Canon novels produced under the auspices of the Lucasfilm Story Group. Headlines were used on the title pages of the novel's sections to provide context to the plot.
